title: Bluetooth Speaker with HD Sound, IPX5 Waterproof, 24H Playtime, and Light Effects
description: Enjoy unparalleled sound quality with this Bluetooth speaker's 2 drivers and advanced technology, delivering powerful, well-balanced sound with minimal distortion. Connect two speakers together to create an immersive stereo sound experience and fill any room with powerful sound. Built to handle rough use and adverse weather conditions, this speaker features an IPX5 rating for protection against water splashes and spills, making it an ideal choice for outdoor events. Experience extended playtime with up to 24 hours per charge and extended wireless range with Bluetooth 5.3, reaching up to 100 feet from your device. Enjoy vibrant light effects that sync to the beat of the music and customize the light effects to suit your preference. Includes 1 waterproof Bluetooth speaker, 1 Type-C charging cable, and a quick start guide, all backed by lifetime technical support. Perfect for home, party, outdoor, beach, and more.

title: USB C Adapter Cable Kit - Multi Charging & Data Transfer
description: Get the most out of your device with this USB C Adapter Cable Kit! This kit includes four different ports for charging, data transfer, and more. It comes with a USB C cable and 3 USB adapters for Android/IOS devices, and is made of a durable scratch resistant aluminum alloy. The internal copper wire is larger and thicker than normal cables, which helps increase charging speed and transfer data. It also features a compact and portable design, and a multi-functional storage case with 3 storage slots and a SIM eject tool. Get your cable kit today!

title: 16 inch 3D HD Screen Amplifier - Foldable Phone Stand Holder
description: Enjoy a home theater-like experience with this 16 inch 3D HD Screen Amplifier. It is compatible with all makes and models of smartphones and is designed to increase the screen size by 2-4 times with no slipping. Its pull-out design makes it easy to carry and store, and its eye protection technology prevents visual fatigue caused by long hours of reading and watching movies. A great gift for family and friends, it is the perfect way to watch movies, videos, read and game in comfort.

title: ONXE LED USB Clock Fan with Real Time Display Function
description: Keep cool in any position with the ONXE LED USB Clock Fan. This USB fan features soft PVC blades and a flexible gooseneck for easy adjustment. It also displays real-time information with a special blade that creates an LED clock face. No driver installation is required, simply plug it into any USB port on your laptop or PC. Enjoy the convenience of this ONXE LED USB Clock Fan and its 1 year warranty.

title: KuccHero Outdoor Bluetooth Speaker with LED Atmosphere Lamp
description: Get ready to enjoy crisp, clear music and exciting lighting effects with the KuccHero Outdoor Bluetooth Speaker. This 4-in-1 multifunction speaker can work as a portable Bluetooth speaker, an LED night light, an atmosphere lamp, and an LED lantern. It comes with a handy carrying handle, a height-adjustable stake, a hook, and a wall mount so you can take it anywhere. It features state-of-the-art DSP technology and dedicated drivers to deliver crystal clear and 360° room-filling sound. The LED lantern speaker also lets you choose from 3 lighting modes or turn the light off. You can pair up to 100 speakers via Bluetooth to create a 360° HD stereo surround sound system. This portable lantern Bluetooth speaker is perfect for adding fun illumination, crisp music, and a romantic atmosphere to birthdays, holidays, parties, outdoor activities, and Christmas.

title: Electric Can Opener - Black
description: Open standard-sized cans with ease with this electric can opener. Features a powerful stainless steel blade, automatic stop, on/off, and release/locking mechanisms, a wide non-slip base, a magnetic lid holder, and a modern, compact design with durable plastic housing.

title: PowerTRC USB Powered Plasma Ball | Science Toy | Electronic Plasma Light Gadget | Desk Toy | Classroom Accessory
description: Electrify your friends and family with this fun gadget. Place it in your car, desk or at home and watch the colorful lights as it reacts to your touch or sounds. Safe and fun for all ages, this science toy is made of durable ABS plastic material and is ASTM & CPSC Tested and Certified. USB POWERED (Included) and/or BATTERY OPERATED (3x AAA not included). 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed.

title: Gadget Guard Pro-Active Double Tempered Glass Screen Protectors for iPhone 14 Plus & 13 Pro Max - 2 Pack
description: Enjoy maximum protection for your Apple iPhone 14 Plus & 13 Pro Max with the Gadget Guard Pro-Active Double Tempered Glass Screen Protectors. Crafted with aluminosilicate (SIO2:Al203), the same material used in space shuttle windows, these screen protectors offer double the strength and edge-chip resistance compared to traditional glass. With a total thickness of 0.51 mm, they feature 0.33 mm aluminosilicate glass for resilience and 0.18 mm optically clear adhesive for a seamless user experience. Plus, the Easy-Align Tool ensures effortless installation. Enjoy crystal-clear clarity and vibrant colors with Gadget Guard Pro-Active Double Tempered Glass Screen Protectors!

title: FANGOR 1080P HD Projector - WiFi & Bluetooth Compatible, 230” Projection Screen
description: Enjoy a cinematic experience with the FANGOR 1080P HD Projector. Featuring native resolution of 1920*1080 and contrast ratio of 10000:1, this projector provides sharp and detailed HD images. Connect your device with the projector via WiFi or Bluetooth. Compatible with HDMI, VGA, USB, Laptop, iOS & Android devices. Enjoy stereo surround sound with the built-in speakers. With a large projection screen size of up to 230 inches, you can enjoy movies and content in a theatre-like setting. Reliable customer service support with 30-day return guarantee and 1-year tech support.

title: Tile Pro - Bluetooth Tracker, Item Locator and Keys Finder
description: Keep track of your belongings with Tile Pro, a powerful Bluetooth tracker that can help you find your keys, bags, and more. With up to 400 ft of range, you can easily locate your items from the Tile app on both iOS and Android devices, or ask your Smart Home device to help you find them. Tile Pro is water-resistant and comes with a one-year replaceable battery. Upgrade to a Premium Plan to get proactive Smart Alert notifications and Item Reimbursement if your Tiled item is lost.

title: 12x60 Monocular Telescope with Smartphone Adapter, Tripod & Portable Bag - High Powered BAK4 Prism & FMC Lens for Bird Watching, Hiking & Travel
description: Take your outdoor adventures to the next level with the Pankoo 12x60 Monocular Telescope! Featuring 12x magnification and 6.5° wide field of view, this monocular provides a more comfortable and larger view with clearer details. Equipped with 25mm large eyepieces and 60mm large objective lens, it secures more light transmission and a brighter and larger field of view. With advanced Fully Multi-Coating technology and large BAK4 prism lens, it increases the amount of light transmission and reduces unnecessary light reflection. Comes with a high-quality smartphone adapter and tripod, as well as a sturdy portable case to protect the monocular from shock and scratches. Perfect for bird watching, hiking, travel, sports, concerts, and more!

title: Bluetooth Speaker with HD Sound, IPX5 Waterproof, 24H Playtime, TWS Pairing, BT5.3
description: Enjoy immersive sound quality with this wireless Bluetooth speaker. Featuring two drivers and advanced technology, it delivers powerful sound with minimal distortion. Connect two speakers together for an immersive stereo sound experience. Its IPX5 rating ensures protection against water splashes and spills, making it ideal for outdoor events. With up to 24 hours of playtime per charge and extended Bluetooth range of up to 100 feet, you can enjoy your music for longer. The multi-color lights can be turned off or customized to suit your preference. Package includes 1 waterproof Bluetooth speaker, 1 Type-C charging cable, and a quick start guide. Enjoy hands-free phone calls and music from other devices with the AUX jack (not included). Perfect for music lovers and tech enthusiasts alike.

title: 7-in-1 Electronic Cleaner Kit for Monitor, Cell Phone, Bluetooth, Headset, Lego, Airpods, Laptop Camera Lens
description: Keep your electronics clean and prolong their life with this 7-in-1 electronic cleaner kit! This kit includes a variety of accessories such as nylon bristles, flocking sponge, plastic nib, keycap puller, high-density brush, suede removable cleaning cloth, and screen cleaner solution spray to meet all your cleaning needs. The soft brush set is suitable for most wireless bluetooth, cameras, digital products, keyboards, car interiors, car vents, printers, phones, calculators, speakers, TVs, and computers in the market. The flocking sponge can clean the dust in the wireless charging box of the earphone while the high-density brush can clean the dirt on the sound hole of the earphone. The plastic nib can clean the stubborn dust in the corner while the suede detachable cleaning

title: Perytong Sleep Headphones Wireless Bluetooth Sports Headband
description: Get a good night's sleep with the Perytong Sleep Headphones Wireless Bluetooth Sports Headband. This comfortable headband features ultra-thin HD stereo speakers and a built-in microphone to ensure you won't miss any calls. The rechargeable lithium battery provides up to 10 hours of playing time. The headband is made of durable braided cord and offers a breathable mesh lining that will easily stretch to fit all head sizes. Compatible with Android and iOS devices, this is the perfect choice for sleep, workouts, jogging, yoga, and more.

title: BUBM Double Layer Electronic Accessories Organizer
description: Keep all your electronic accessories organized and secure with this BUBM Double Layer Electronic Accessories Organizer. It features a double layer Nylon interior compartment, providing enough room for cables, flash disks, USB drives, Power, Headphones and more. It is made of heavy-duty, durable and waterproof nylon material and is lightweight and spacious for easy carrying. Perfect for fitting into your briefcase, luggage or backpack. Ideal for travel and everyday use.

title: AMAZTIM X1 Fitness Tracker - 100M Waterproof, 50 Days Extra-Long Battery, 3D Curved Glass, Full Metal Smart Watch
description: ⌚AMAZTIM X1 is the first 3D curved smartwatch, featuring a flexible beauty of the curved glass and the Corning Gorilla screen for resilience against various screen hazards. Military-grade materials and fully enclosed design make it the toughest and most durable watch available, successfully passing 15 MIL-STD-810H certifications including salt spray, rain, and impact tests. It is 100M waterproof (10ATM/IP69K) and has an ultra-long life battery of up to 50 days. The 1.47" HD AMOLED display features anti-glare technology, 100%RGB color gamut, and 1000NIT brightness for clear and vivid visuals. This fitness watch also monitors health data with its advanced real-time monitoring function, pedometer, and up

title: Multi-Functional USB Adapter Kit - Charge Card with Type-C/Type-A/Micro-USB/Lightning
description: Get the convenience of charging multiple devices with a single USB port with this Multi-Functional USB Adapter Kit. It includes a Type-C to C Cable, Type-C to Lightning, Type-C to Micro USB, Type-C to A Adapter, and a Card Removal Tool. Made from TPE and wheat straw, this compact cable kit has a size of 3.35*2.95 inches, making it easy to carry in a pocket, wallet, or handbag. Enjoy fast charging and eliminate the need for carrying multiple individual adapters or cables with this foldable cable storage box.

title: 10000mAh Power Bank (2 Pack) - Ultra Slim Portable Charger with Type C Input & 2 Outputs
description: Keep your devices powered up on the go with this 10000mAh Power Bank (2 Pack) from AONIMI. This ultra-slim design is easy to hold and perfect for travel, with dual USB outputs and Type C input for fast charging. The 4 LED lights show the current remaining power of the item, and the built-in smart protection system ensures complete safety. Compatible with most phones, tablets, and other electronic devices, this power bank can charge 6-8 times to keep you powered up. Includes 2 power banks, Micro USB cables, and user manuals.

title: USB Charging Station with 6 Outlets & Dual USB Ports
description: Charge up to 6 devices with this USB Charging Station! Featuring 3 wall outlets, 2 USB ports with a total output of 3.1A, and a C port block, this charging cube is the perfect tech gadget for charging multiple electronics at once. With an 1875W outlet extender, it is the perfect solution for all your charging needs.

title: JBL Tune 125TWS True Wireless In-Ear Headphones - Pure Bass Sound
description: Enjoy JBL's world-renowned Pure Bass sound with the Tune 125TWS True Wireless In-Ear Headphones. With up to 32 hours of battery life (8 hours in the earbuds plus 24 hours in the case) and fast pair enabled by Google, you can enjoy music and calls with either one or both buds. The earbuds come with three sizes of eartips to fit your size comfortably. Bluetooth version 5.0 and driver sensitivity at 1kHz/1mW (dB) 96. Dynamic frequency response range (Hz) 20 Hz – 20 kHz.
